entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:54 AM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:54 AM CDT Monday 20 March 2023
